titleStmt.title: To the King's most excellent Majestie the humble remonstrance, acknoledgement, protestation, and petition of the Roman Catholick clergy of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Walsh, Peter, 1618?-1688.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Fr. Peter Walsh of S. Fran. Ord. Reader of div. and procurator of the Rom. Cath. clerg. both sec. & reg. of Ireland [and 23 others].
Imperfect: creased with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Ireland.
